channel.title: Learn a new skill in 20 hours
channel.description:
https://youtu.be/lB6K60mkmho
1. Pick a specific ability, ie I want to be able to play Faith by George Michael on guitar, not I want to play guitar 2. Deconstruct the skill into 20-100 subskills and choose the top few that have the most effect 3. Do fast and broad research to determine those skills 4. Remove barriers to start practicing 5. commit to daily practice times on yoir calendar
